Original:
這家餐廳處理危機的方式很有趣。首先責怪你的客戶絕對不是最明智的舉動。

認為這是解決顧客不滿的失敗嘗試

餐廳老闆實際上做了什麼：
1.首先責怪客戶（為什麼？？）
2.找出他們自己對付費客戶的仇恨評論的負面影響
3.刪除對顧客的仇恨評論
4.在知道仇恨評論對生意不利後，就採取「道歉策略」並扮演受害者（但我們現在都知道這些「道歉」絕不是真誠的......我想失去明星一定會受傷）
5. 扮演受害者並指責顧客反應過度
6.扮演受害者
7.扮演受害者

只是承認你一開始就做錯了（我知道你沒有聘請酒類促銷女士，但她在你的店裡，你親自決定讓他們能夠在那裡）。你只會贏得客戶的尊重......
EN:
This restaurant is very interesting to deal with crisis.First of all, blame your customers is definitely not the most wise move.

I think this is an attempt to solve the failure of customers' dissatisfaction

What the restaurant owner actually did:
1. First blame customers (why??)
2. Find out the negative impact of their own hate comments on paid customers
3. Delete hatred comments for customers
4. After knowing that hatred comments are not good for business, we adopt a "apology strategy" and play the victims (but we now know that these "apology" is by no means sincere ... I want to lose the stars and will be injured)
5. Playing the victim and accusing customers of excessive response
6. Playing the victim
7. Playing the victim

I just admit that you did something wrong (I know you did not hire wine promotions ladies, but in your shop, you personally decided to allow them to be there).You will only win the respect of customers ...
